runs.comm: hint of extra bounce from the length area outside off, Manzoor is hit on the glove as he looks to stab that off the frontfoot
full and angling into middle from wide of the crease, nudging 140 clicks, Manzoor takes his bottom hand off as he defends with soft hands
short and wide outside off, he had a slash at that one but couldn't connect. Scoring opportunity missed
width on offer again, looks to crack that over point, too late on the stroke, zips to the keeper
stands tall and pats it with an angled bat to point
gets big on him, he gets onto his toes and runs it down to third man. Excellent first over from Taskin

beauty first up and a huge roar resonates across the stadium. That one pitches on length and just takes off, Manzoor was half-forward as he looked to defend, but the ball got big on him and kissed the glove on the way through to Mushfiqur. Another failure for Manzoor, another poor start for Pakistan.
nips away from outside off, left alone
steered wide of point, Taskin is quick to get to the ball at third man
uppish but falls short of the point fielder, hint of away movement
excellent flick of the wrists. Picks it from middle and the ball flies over deep backward square leg. Made it look very easy.
shows the full face of the bat and drives it to mid-off
full on off from wide of the crease, Hafeez plays back to a delivery he could have well played forward, tapped to point
not much room to cut, Hafeez bunts it to point after initially shaping to cut
shapes back in from the fifth stump, Hafeez watches it through to the wicketkeeper
shapes to pull but is beaten for pace, was into the stroke a little too early, pressure building
nips back into middle, he gets a thick inside edge onto the pad as the ball rolls to the off side
good stride forward, tapped to cover point
tossed up on middle, he gets forward and blocks
on the shorter side, he swivels and pulls that past the diving square leg fielder
turning into middle and leg, whipped to Shakib at square leg
looks to slog sweep but changes his stroke at the last second, hit high on the pad

knocked him over! This one was nicely tossed up, he looked to set himself up for a biff over deep midwicket, but only managed to connect with the cool Mirpur air. The ball spins back in to hit middle stump. Pakistan in early trouble
plays a slog sweep but is extremely lucky to get away with that. Gets a glove as the ball lobs where a leg slip would have been, runs away into the fine leg boundary. Adventurous
walks across the stumps and pulls it down to deep square, didn't time it well at all
gets a thick inside edge to cover, he wanted a single but sent back by Hafeez
taps it with soft hands to the off side and scoots across for a quick single, this time Hafeez was off the blocks immediately
played straight to backward point

appeal for lbw, almost a belated one, and the umpire raises the finger, the crowd roars in delight. The ball came back in a long way, Hafeez was hit on middle and leg, near the thigh. Mortaza was the only one who went up spontaneously before the keeper joined him and Hafeez has to walk back. Have to say he may have been unfortunate there, ball would have clearly gone over. Hafeez has a wry smile as he walks off
big appeal, this time the umpire isn't convinced. Akmal pokes at an away-swinger, misses
back of length delivery outside off, punched to cover
tapped to point, a direct hit at the striker's end and Umar Akmal would have continued running back to the pavillion. Sabbir Rahman the fielder in question
yorker-length delivery on off, squeezed to the off side
whipped to backward square leg, Bangladesh won't mind the singles
excellent stroke, but an even better stop by Sabbir. Saved four runs for his side at point. Throwing himself full length to his right to stop that
dabbed with soft hands to point, end of the Power Play overs
length ball on off, defended with soft hands
superb bowling this, so far he was bringing it back in. This one moves away after pitching on off, Akmal is beaten fair and square
jags back in from off, pushed to short cover
worked wide of square leg for an easy single
top shot. On the pads and he takes full toll of that. Nice clean connection as the ball splits the gap between midwicket and mid-on
punched back to the bowler
slow turn from off, punched to long-off
nicely tossed up, he's made to reach out, pushed to cover
appeal for lbw, Sarfraz went a long way across to sweep, hit high on the pad and they scamper for a leg-bye. Looks like there was a bit of glove, good decision
slides back into middle and leg, played wide of midwicket
sweeps and misses. Premeditated
grips the surface and spins away from off, he shaped to cut, toe-ended it to cover in the end
he pushes back to a full delivery on middle, somehow manages to get some bat on it

steps out to go over cover, ends up slicing it towards deep point. The ball was swirling in the air for a long time, Shakib positioned himself nicely and took it quite easily. First sign of aggression from Akmal and he has to perish.
floats it full on middle from wide of the crease, played back down the pitch
nips away from the length area outside off, left alone
gets half-forward and pats it to cover point
uppish but just wide of point, races away towards third man
steered to Mashrafe at point, slow turn on offer here for Shakib
arm ball, Malik shapes to pull, ball keeps coming back in to cramp him up, somehow manages to play a half-pull to midwicket
steps out but can't get to the pitch of the ball, hit on the pad as he looks to turn it away
played back to the bowler with the spin
is made to lunge forward as he smothers the spin
quality stroke! Risky, but that has paid off. Backs away to cut that from leg stump, almost, played it really late and managed to split the gap between point and short third man. Welcome boundary
played back to the bowler
gets forward and pats it back again
excellent stop off his own bowling
trifle short, he makes room and cuts it to deep point
steps out and works it off his wrists to deep square
sliding into middle and leg, Malik tickles it past short fine leg. Easily done, first bad ball they've bowled in a while
stands well outside leg to open up the off side and then strokes the ball into the gap at deep cover
steps out but can't get to the pitch, manages an inside edge that lobs in the air, Mushfiqur runs around quickly and dishes in the dive, but it just eludes him
turned to the on side for a quick single, keeper quick to get across but the batsmen just a touch quicker
driven to cover
too short, he's pulled that towards wide long-on where Sabbir nearly makes a mess of it, but quickly recovers to pull it back in. Using the depth of the crease nicely on that occasion
opens the face of the bat and plays it to sweeper cover
gets onto his toes and whips it away to deep square
full and straight from round the stumps, he slaps it to mid-off, good work there
superb wrist work, opens it up nicely as he makes room and crashes that behind point. Top quality batting this. It was the slower one, he picked it off the hand and placed it superbly
dabs it to point
mistimes a pull, good running as the wide long-on fielder had to run at least 20 metres to his right
steps out and then realises he's cramped for room, tapped to point
steps out and chips it over the bowler's head
loopy delivery outside off, driven to sweeper cover
fired into middle and leg, swept hard to deep backward square
steps out and drives it inside-out to wide long-off
fired in full on off, he steps out, gets across and whips it to deep midwicket
beautiful swing of the arms and gets the elevation. Dances down the track, gets underneath the flight and deposits it over the sightscreen.
slapped away powerfully. Length ball on off, he steps out, makes room and crashes it into the sweeper cover boundary
tucked wide of square leg, excellent running. Al-Amin was caught napping
pulled, but not timed off the middle, straight to deep midwicket
whipped to deep midwicket
excellent bouncer, he set himself to sweep that, but the ball got big on him
he's picked the bones out of that one. Almost as if he was waiting for it. Full toss on middle, swung away over deep square leg, nearly into the second tier. They're getting a move on finally.
fired full and outside off, Malik lets it go thinking it would be called wide, umpire thinks it was just inside the line
whipped to deep square
steps out and works it wide of midwicket, the fielder running in from the ropes slipped a bit and that allowed them to complete the second easily
makes room and cuts it wide of the diving point fielder
drilled into the gap at sweeper cover. What power, excellent use of the bottom hand. Too full and punished
full toss, almost waist high, he swings but doesn't entirely hit it off the middle, still enough to blast past Shakib's outstretched hands and into the boundary
muscled to long-on
fired down leg side, worked wide of deep backward square leg
bisects the gap at sweeper cover. Bowled flat outside off, he uses the width well to slap that into the gap in the deep

the change of angle has done the trick. This was pitched on leg, Malik didn't get the free swing of his arms as he looked to slog that across the line, only managed a top edge as Sabbir, at deep midwicket, took an easy catch. Malik has done his job though
steps out and works it wide of the deep midwicket fielder, Sabbir had to run around the boundary to get there
swept but straight to short fine, they scamper through for a single
full and straight on middle, swung away towards long on, got the toe end of the bat
slices a full toss, just lands short of short third man
full toss on middle, and he's picked the fielder at deep midwicket. Didn't get the connection as he looked to swing that over the ropes. He's out again within the bat of an eyelid
into the blockhole, squeezed to deep midwicket
excellent yorker again, he can't get underneath it as he looks to squeeze it behind point, top over so far
crashed towards deep cover, an overthrow gives them an extra run, the bowler wasn't backing up for Tamim's throw from the deep, lazy effort
backs away and squeezes a yorker-length delivery to deep point
slapped to deep point, Shakib has been a busy man today
makes room and carves it over the infield, Shakib at it again at deep point
top edges a wild slog, no one behind the keeper's head, one bounce into the fine leg boundary
full toss on middle, he mistimes it to the man at cover, they scamper through for a single
right in the slot, he gets under it and lofts it inside-out over cover, bisects the gap in the deep. Excellent fifty under pressure
high full toss outside off, he slices it towards deep point

that was headed only one way the moment he hit it, and that was over the ropes. Full toss on middle, he swings across the line, generates enough power to take it towards the doorstep of the dressing room at deep square
squeezed wide of the keeper for a single
mistimes a slog towards deep midwicket, they scamper back for the second
excellent yorker, but he squeezes it towards deep square, the throw at the striker's end was wide so Anwar's dive gets him back in
swung away towards deep midwicket, where Soumya Sarkar takes an excellent catch. Flat hit, it was dipping on him but he did well to run in early and make it look simple
